quest1: Welcome to your final exam Kazumi!
Now let's go through everything I've taught you.
Try to get to me using A or D.
quest2: You can ask for advice by pressing E.
quest3: Being able to run is very important in combat.
You can escape from dangerous situations easily.
Try pressing SHIFT when holding A or D.
quest4: Jumping is also important, when moving through the difficult terrain.
quest5: We'll use that training dummy over there.
Try attacking it with your katana using mouse1.
quest6: Now you are a real fighter!
But close combat isn't alway the best approach.
Time to practice long distance combat.
Throw kunai at the dummy using C key
quest7: Now try throwing shuriken usin X key.
quest8: Let's get to more advanced combat technique!
Chakra combat is a very powerful type, but it'll consume your chakra.
Therefore you need to think before using it.
Try to shoot fireball using W key.
quest9: Try regenerating your chakra by holding Ctrl key.
quest10: Because now, we'll proceed to the next part of your exam.
Go through the door to the garden I'll be waiting for you there.
But if you want to practice some more you can.
